00024       iterator(new ::FLAC::Metadata::SimpleIterator), playCheck(false),
00025       seekCheck(false), fileSize(-1), streamSize(-1), avrBitrate(-1),
00026       totalSamples(0), totalTime(-1), curr_sample(0),

00028           new ::FLAC::Metadata::StreamInfo::StreamInfo) {

00036 FLAC__StreamDecoderWriteStatus write_callback(const FLAC__StreamDecoder * dec,
00037     const FLAC__Frame * frame, const FLAC__int32 * const buf[],
00038     void * client_data) {
00039   //          std::cout << "write_callback" << std::endl;
00040 
00041   SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC * flacObj =
00042       static_cast<SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC *> (client_data);
00043   int decoded_size = frame -> header.blocksize * frame -> header.channels
00044       * (frame -> header.bits_per_sample / 8); // 16384, 18432
00045 
00046   unsigned int samples = frame -> header.blocksize;
00047   unsigned int sample = 0;
00048   unsigned int i = 0;
00049   unsigned short int channel = 0;
00050 
00051   int16_t outbuf[FLAC__MAX_BLOCK_SIZE * FLAC__MAX_CHANNELS * sizeof(int32_t)]; // 65535 * 8 * 4
00052 
00053   for (sample = i = 0; sample < samples; sample++) {
00054     for (channel = 0; channel < frame -> header.channels; channel++, i++) {
00055       outbuf[i] = buf[channel][sample];
00056     }
00057     flacObj -> setCurrSample(flacObj -> getCurrSample() + 1);
00058   }
00059   write(flacObj -> getdspDev(), outbuf, decoded_size);
00060   return FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_WRITE_STATUS_CONTINUE;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void metadata_callback(const FLAC__StreamDecoder * dec,
00064     const FLAC__StreamMetadata * block, void * client_data) {
00065 }
00066 
00067 // callback-ф-ция для перехвата ошибок
00068 void error_callback(const ::FLAC__StreamDecoder *decoder,
00069     ::FLAC__StreamDecoderErrorStatus status, void *client_data) {
00070   if (status == FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_ERROR_STATUS_LOST_SYNC) {
00071     std::cout
00072         << "Error: error_callback(): An error in the stream caused the decoder to lose synchronization"
00073         << std::endl;
00074   } else if (status == FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_ERROR_STATUS_BAD_HEADER) {
00075     std::cout
00076         << "Error: error_callback(): The decoder encountered a corrupted frame header"
00077         << std::endl;
00078   } else if (status == FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_ERROR_STATUS_FRAME_CRC_MISMATCH) {
00079     std::cout
00080         << "Error: error_callback(): The frame's data did not match the CRC in the footer"
00081         << std::endl;
00082   } else if (status == FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_ERROR_STATUS_UNPARSEABLE_STREAM) {
00083     std::cout
00084         << "Error: error_callback(): The decoder encountered reserved fields in use in the stream"
00085         << std::endl;
00086   }
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::templateInitFile(FLAC__StreamDecoder * dec) {
00090 
00091   FLAC__StreamDecoderInitStatus retCode = FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file(dec,
00092       this -> fileName.c_str(), write_callback, metadata_callback,
00093       error_callback, this);
00094 
00095   switch (retCode) {
00096   case FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_INIT_STATUS_OK:
00097     break;
00098   case FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_INIT_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED_CONTAINER:
00099     std::cout << "Error in FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file(): "
00100         << "The library was not compiled with support for the given container format"
00101         << std::endl;
00102     return false;
00103     break;
00104   case FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_INIT_STATUS_INVALID_CALLBACKS:
00105     std::cout << "Error in FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file(): "
00106         << "A required callback was not supplied" << std::endl;
00107     return false;
00108     break;
00109   case FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_INIT_STATUS_MEMORY_ALLOCATION_ERROR:
00110     std::cout << "Error in FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file(): "
00111         << "An error occurred allocating memory" << std::endl;
00112     return false;
00113     break;
00114   case FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_INIT_STATUS_ERROR_OPENING_FILE:
00115     std::cout << "Error in FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file(): "
00116         << "fopen() failed in FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file() or FLAC__stream_decoder_init_ogg_file()"
00117         << std::endl;
00118     return false;
00119     break;
00120   case FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_INIT_STATUS_ALREADY_INITIALIZED:
00121     std::cout << "Error in FLAC__stream_decoder_init_file(): "
00122         << "FLAC__stream_decoder_init_*() was called when the decoder was already initialized, usually because FLAC__stream_decoder_finish() was not called."
00123         << std::endl;
00124     return false;
00125     break;
00126   }
00127   return true;
00128 }

00130 bool SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::init(std::string inputFile) {
00131   this -> dspDev = this -> ddata -> getDSPDev();
00132   std::cout << "FLAC in init()" << " : " << getV() << std::endl;
00133   this -> fileName = inputFile;
00134 
00135   this -> decoder = FLAC__stream_decoder_new();
00136   this -> templateInitFile(this -> decoder);
00137 
00138   // обязательно для заполнения стуктуры
00139   FLAC__stream_decoder_process_single(this -> decoder);
00140 
00141   this -> parseMetaData();
00142 
00143   return true;
00144 }

00146 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::play(void) {
00147   if (!this -> seekCheck) { // если мы делаем seek то выделать заново память не нужно
00148     this -> pdecoder = FLAC__stream_decoder_new();
00149   }
00150   if (this -> pdecoder == NULL) {
00151     std::cout << "Error to FLAC__stream_decoder_new() " << std::endl;
00152   }
00153   if (!this -> playCheck) {
00154     this -> templateInitFile(this -> pdecoder);
00155   }
00156   this -> playCheck = true;
00157   // обязательно для заполнения стуктуры
00158   FLAC__stream_decoder_process_single(this -> pdecoder);
00159   this -> totalSamples = FLAC__stream_decoder_get_total_samples(
00160       this -> pdecoder);
00161 
00162   std::cout << "FLAC in play()" << std::endl;
00163 
00164   this -> ddata -> setParam();
00165   while (FLAC__stream_decoder_process_until_end_of_stream(this -> pdecoder)) {
00166     if (FLAC__stream_decoder_get_state(this -> pdecoder)
00167         == FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_END_OF_STREAM) {
00168       std::cout << "End of stream." << std::endl;
00169     }
00170     break;
00171   }
00172 }

00174 unsigned long int SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::getCurrSeekPos(void) const {
00175   if (!this -> curr_sample) {
00176     return 0;
00177   } else {
00178     return (100 / (this -> totalSamples / this -> curr_sample));
00179   }
00180 }
00181 
00182 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::setSeekPos(double val) {
00183   this -> seekCheck = true;
00184   FLAC__uint64 sample_pos = (((this -> totalSamples) * (val / 100)));
00185   if (FLAC__stream_decoder_seek_absolute(this -> pdecoder, sample_pos) != true) {
00186     std::cout << "Error in FLAC__stream_decoder_seek_absolute()" << std::endl;
00187   }
00188   this -> setCurrSample(sample_pos);
00189 }

00191 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::readVorbisComment(void) {
00192   this -> vorbisComm . clear();
00193 
00194   ::FLAC::Metadata::VorbisComment * tags = new ::FLAC::Metadata::VorbisComment;
00195   ::FLAC::Metadata::get_tags(this-> fileName . c_str(), tags);
00196 
00197   for (unsigned int i = 0; i != tags -> get_num_comments(); ++i) {
00198     ::FLAC::Metadata::VorbisComment::Entry entry = tags -> get_comment(i);
00199     vorbisComm[::Utils::Func::toUpper(entry . get_field_name())]
00200         = entry . get_field_value();
00201   }
00202 
00203   this -> ddata -> setVorbisComment(this -> vorbisComm);
00204   delete tags;
00205 }

00207 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::getPicture(void) {
00208   //             this -> picture = new ::FLAC::Metadata::Picture();
00209   ::FLAC::Metadata::Picture picture;
00210   std::multimap<FLAC__StreamMetadata_Picture_Type, std::string> picData;
00211 
00212   //          Proxy < ::FLAC::Metadata::Picture > picture;
00213 
00214   //          unsigned short int count = 0;
00215   if (::FLAC::Metadata::get_picture(this-> fileName . c_str(), picture,
00216                         static_cast<::FLAC__StreamMetadata_Picture_Type> (-1), NULL, NULL,
00217                         -1, -1, -1, -1) == true) {
00218 
00219     this -> spdata . clear();
00220     //                  picture -> clear();
00221     //                  std::cout << "MYYYYY COUNT: " << count << std::endl;
00222 
00223     const FLAC__byte * pdata = picture . get_data();
00224 
00225     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < picture . get_length(); ++i) {
00226       spdata += pdata[i];
00227     }
00228     std::cout << "PICTURE!!!" << std::endl;
00229     std::cout << "PICTURE: " << picture . get_data_length() << std::endl;
00230     picData . insert(std::pair<::FLAC__StreamMetadata_Picture_Type,
00231         std::string>(picture . get_type(), spdata));
00232     std::cout << "FLAC COUNT: " << picData.size() << std::endl;
00233   }
00234   //               this -> ddata . setPicture ( picData );
00235   //               delete picture; picture = 0;
00236 }

00239   this -> ddata -> setAudioParams(this -> fileSize, this -> totalTime,
00240       this -> streamInfo -> get_channels(),
00241       this -> streamInfo -> get_sample_rate(), this -> avrBitrate,
00242       this -> streamInfo -> get_bits_per_sample());

00245 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::setPicture(std::string coverData) {
00246   ::FLAC::Metadata::Picture * picture = new ::FLAC::Metadata::Picture;
00247   // конвертируем данные в coverData нужные set_data() в const FLAC__byte *
00248   const FLAC__byte * data = (const FLAC__byte *) coverData.c_str();
00249 
00250   if (picture -> set_data(data, coverData . size()) == false) {
00251     std::cout << "Error to set picture!" << std::endl;
00252   }
00253 
00254   // инициализируем итератор в режиме чтение-запись
00255   iterator -> init(this -> fileName.c_str(), false, true);
00256 
00257   // Используем ImageMagik дляполучения параметров рисунка ( высота, ширина, глубина, тип )
00258   Magick::Image * imagick = new Magick::Image;
00259   Magick::Blob * blob = new Magick::Blob(coverData.c_str(), coverData.size());
00260   imagick -> read(*blob);
00261 
00262   // составляем mime-тип ( напр. "image/png" )
00263   std::string mime = "image/" + Utils::Func::toLower(std::string(
00264       imagick -> magick()));
00265 
00266   // записываем эти значения в обект picture
00267   picture -> set_mime_type(mime.c_str());
00268   picture -> set_width(imagick -> size() . width());
00269   picture -> set_height(imagick -> size() . height());
00270   picture -> set_depth(imagick -> depth());
00271 
00272   // запись в файл
00273   iterator -> insert_block_after(picture);
00274 
00275   // освобождаем память
00276   delete imagick;
00277   delete blob;
00278   delete picture;
00279   delete iterator;
00280 }

00282 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::closeF(void) {
00283   FLAC__stream_decoder_finish(this -> decoder);
00284   FLAC__stream_decoder_flush(this -> decoder);
00285 }

00310   // delete streamInfo;

00320 void SilentMedia::Codec::FLAC::parseMetaData(void) {
00321   iterator -> init(this -> fileName.c_str(), false, true);
00322 
00323   ::FLAC::Metadata::get_streaminfo(this -> fileName.c_str(),
00324       *this -> streamInfo);
00325 
00326   this -> fileSize = Utils::Func::getFileSize(this -> fileName);
00327   // применяем сдесь ф-цию FLAC__stream_decoder_get_total_samples() !
00328   this -> totalTime = (FLAC__stream_decoder_get_total_samples(this -> decoder)
00329       / this -> streamInfo -> get_sample_rate());
00330 
00331   unsigned int size = 0; // переменная для инкремента размера всех найденых блоков
00332   while (!iterator -> is_last()) {
00333     switch (iterator -> get_block_type()) {
00334     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_STREAMINFO:
00335       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_STREAMINFO" << std::endl;
00336       break;
00337     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_PADDING:
00338       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_PADDING" << std::endl;
00339       break;
00340     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_APPLICATION:
00341       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_APPLICATION" << std::endl;
00342       break;
00343     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_SEEKTABLE:
00344       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_SEEKTABLE" << std::endl;
00345       break;
00346     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_VORBIS_COMMENT:
00347       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_VORBIS_COMMENT" << std::endl;
00348       this -> readVorbisComment();
00349       break;
00350     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_CUESHEET:
00351       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_CUESHEET" << std::endl;
00352       break;
00353     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_PICTURE:
00354       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_PICTURE" << std::endl;
00355       this -> getPicture();
00356       break;
00357     case FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_UNDEFINED:
00358       //                   std::cout << "FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_UNDEFINED" << std::endl;
00359       break;
00360     }
00361     iterator -> next(); // движемся далее
00362     size += iterator -> get_block_length();
00363   }
00364   // получаем размер полезных аудио-данных
00365   this -> streamSize = this -> fileSize - size;
00366   // получаем средний битрейт
00367   this -> avrBitrate = this -> streamSize / this -> totalTime * 8;
00368   this -> setDSPParam();
00369 }
